00014 #ifndef U_MIMEHEADER_H

00020 /*
00021    Mime-type headers comprise a keyword followed by ":" followed by whitespace and the value.
00022    If a line begins with whitespace it is a continuation of the preceeding line.
00023    MIME headers are delimited by an empty line.  Well-known header fields are those documented
00024    in RFC-822 (standard email), RFC-1036 (USENET messages), RFC-2045 (MIME messages), and possibly other RFCs.
00025 
00026    Text&         Subject()                { return (Text&)           FieldBody("Subject"); }
00027    Text&         Comments()               { return (Text&)           FieldBody("Comments"); }
00028    Text&         InReplyTo()              { return (Text&)           FieldBody("In-Reply-To"); }
00029    Text&         Keywords()               { return (Text&)           FieldBody("Keywords"); }
00030    Text&         Encrypted()              { return (Text&)           FieldBody("Encrypted"); }
00031    Text&         Received()               { return (Text&)           FieldBody("Received"); }
00032    Text&         References()             { return (Text&)           FieldBody("References"); }
00033    MsgId&        MessageId()              { return (MsgId&)          FieldBody("Message-Id"); }
00034    MsgId&        ResentMessageId()        { return (MsgId&)          FieldBody("Resent-Message-Id"); }
00035    DateTime&     Date()                   { return (DateTime&)       FieldBody("Date"); }
00036    DateTime&     ResentDate()             { return (DateTime&)       FieldBody("Resent-Date"); }
00037    Address&      ReturnPath()             { return (Address&)        FieldBody("Return-Path"); }
00038    AddressList&  Bcc()                    { return (AddressList&)    FieldBody("Bcc"); }
00039    AddressList&  Cc()                     { return (AddressList&)    FieldBody("Cc"); }
00040    AddressList&  ReplyTo()                { return (AddressList&)    FieldBody("Reply-To"); }
00041    AddressList&  ResentBcc()              { return (AddressList&)    FieldBody("Resent-Bcc"); }
00042    AddressList&  ResentCc()               { return (AddressList&)    FieldBody("Resent-Cc"); }
00043    AddressList&  ResentReplyTo()          { return (AddressList&)    FieldBody("Resent-Reply-To"); }
00044    AddressList&  ResentTo()               { return (AddressList&)    FieldBody("Resent-To"); }
00045    AddressList&  To()                     { return (AddressList&)    FieldBody("To"); }
00046    Mailbox&      ResentSender()           { return (Mailbox&)        FieldBody("Resent-Sender"); }
00047    Mailbox&      Sender()                 { return (Mailbox&)        FieldBody("Sender"); }
00048    MailboxList&  From()                   { return (MailboxList&)    FieldBody("From"); }
00049    MailboxList&  ResentFrom()             { return (MailboxList&)    FieldBody("Resent-From"); }
00050 
00051    RFC-822 fields
00052 
00053    Text& Approved()                       { return (Text&)           FieldBody("Approved"); }
00054    Text& Control()                        { return (Text&)           FieldBody("Control"); }
00055    Text& Distribution()                   { return (Text&)           FieldBody("Distribution"); }
00056    Text& Expires()                        { return (Text&)           FieldBody("Expires"); }
00057    Text& FollowupTo()                     { return (Text&)           FieldBody("Followup-To"); }
00058    Text& Lines()                          { return (Text&)           FieldBody("Lines"); }
00059    Text& Newsgroups()                     { return (Text&)           FieldBody("Newsgroups"); }
00060    Text& Organization()                   { return (Text&)           FieldBody("Organization"); }
00061    Text& Path()                           { return (Text&)           FieldBody("Path"); }
00062    Text& Summary()                        { return (Text&)           FieldBody("Summary"); }
00063    Text& Xref()                           { return (Text&)           FieldBody("Xref"); }
00064 
00065    RFC-1036 fields (USENET messages)
00066 
00067    Text&       MimeVersion()              { return (Text&)           FieldBody("MIME-Version"); }
00068    Text&       ContentDescription()       { return (Text&)           FieldBody("Content-Description"); }
00069    MsgId&      ContentId()                { return (MsgId&)          FieldBody("Content-Id"); }
00070    Mechanism&  ContentTransferEncoding()  { return (Mechanism&)      FieldBody("Content-Transfer-Encoding"); }
00071    MediaType&  ContentType()              { return (MediaType&)      FieldBody("Content-Type"); }
00072 
00073    RFC-2045 fields
00074 
00075    DispositionType& ContentDisposition()  { return (DispositionType&) FieldBody("Content-Disposition"); }
00076 */
00077 
00078 class U_EXPORT UMimeHeader {
00079 public:
00080         // Check for memory error
00081         U_MEMORY_TEST
00082 
00083         // Allocator e Deallocator
00084         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00085         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00086 
00087         static UString* str_name;
00088         static UString* str_ascii;
00089         static UString* str_charset;
00090         static UString* str_boundary;
00091         static UString* str_filename;
00092         static UString* str_txt_xml;
00093         static UString* str_txt_plain;
00094         static UString* str_msg_rfc;
00095         static UString* str_mime_version;
00096         static UString* str_content_transfer_encoding;

00100         // COSTRUTTORI
00101 
00102         UMimeHeader() : table(false) // ignore case...
00103                 {
00104                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UMimeHeader, "", 0)
00105 
00106                 table.allocate();
00107 
00108                 if (                     str_name == 0)                  str_allocate();
00109                 if (USocket::str_host == 0) USocket::str_allocate();
00110                 }
00111 
00112         ~UMimeHeader()
00113                 {
00114                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UMimeHeader)
00115 
00116                 table.clear();
00117                 table.deallocate();
00118                 }
00119 
00120         // Wrapper for table
00121 
00122         void clear()                  {        table.clear(); header.clear(); }
00123         void deallocate()             {        table.deallocate(); }
00124         bool empty() const            { return table.empty(); }
00125         bool ignoreCase() const       { return table.ignoreCase(); }
00126         void setIgnoreCase(bool flag) {        table.setIgnoreCase(flag); }
00127 
00128         UString      erase(const UString& key) { return table.erase(key); }
00129         UString operator[](const UString& key) { return table[key]; }
00130 
00131         // VARIE
00132 
00133         uint32_t parse(const UString& header);
00134 
00135         bool containsHeader(const UString& key) { return table.find(key); }
00136         UString   getHeader(const UString& key) { return table[key]; }
00137 
00138         void removeHeader(const UString& key)
00139                 {
00140                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeHeader::removeHeader(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(key))
00141 
00142                 if (containsHeader(key)) table.eraseAfterFind();
00143                 }
00144 
00145         // Sets a header field, overwriting any existing value
00146 
00147         void setHeader(const UString& key, const UString& value)
00148                 {
00149                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeHeader::setHeader(%.*S,%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(key), U_STRING_TO_TRACE(value))
00150 
00151                 if (containsHeader(key)) table.replaceAfterFind(value);
00152                 else                                                     table.insertAfterFind(key, value);
00153                 }
00154 
00155         bool setHeaderIfAbsent(const UString& key, const UString& value)
00156                 {
00157                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeHeader::setHeaderIfAbsent(%.*S,%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(key), U_STRING_TO_TRACE(value))
00158 
00159                 if (containsHeader(key) == false)
00160                         {
00161                         table.insertAfterFind(key, value);
00162 
00163                         U_RETURN(true);
00164                         }
00165 
00166                 U_RETURN(false);
00167                 }
00168 
00169         // Writes all the headers to the supplied buffer
00170 
00171         UString getHeaders();
00172         void      writeHeaders(UString& buffer);

00175 
00176         UString getHost()
00177                 {
00178                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeHeader::getHost()")
00179 
00180                 U_ASSERT(empty() == false)
00181 
00182                 UString host = getHeader(*USocket::str_host);
00183 
00184                 U_RETURN_STRING(host);
00185                 }
00186 
00187         // Connection: close
00188 
00189         bool isClose()
00190                 {
00191                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeHeader::isClose()")
00192 
00193                 U_ASSERT(empty() == false)
00194 
00195                 bool result = (getHeader(*USocket::str_connection) == *USocket::str_close);
00196 
00197                 U_RETURN(result);
00198                 }

00210                 U_RETURN_STRING(cookie);
00211                 }

00214

00217                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeHeader::isSetCookie()")
00218 
00219                 U_ASSERT(empty() == false)
00220 
00221                 bool result = containsHeader(*USocket::str_setcookie);
00222 
00223                 U_RETURN(result);
00224                 }

00252         bool isMime()
00253                 {
00254                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeHeader::isMime()")
00255 
00256                 bool result = ((table.empty()            == false) &&
00257                                                         (getMimeVersion().empty() == false));
00258 
00259                 U_RETURN(result);
00260                 }
00261 
00262         // Content types: "multipart"   / [ "mixed", "alternative", "digest", "parallel", "signed", "encrypted", "report", "form-data" ],
00263         //                "message"     / [ "rfc822", "disposition-notification" ],
00264         //                "image"       / [ "jpeg", "gif" ],
00265         //                "audio"       / [ "basic" ],
00266         //                "video"       / [ "mpeg" ],
00267         //                "application" / [ "postscript", "octet-stream", "pgp-signature", "pgp-encrypted", "pgp-clearsigned",
00268         //                                  "pkcs7-signature", "pkcs7-mime", "ms-tnef", "x-www-form-urlencoded" ]
00269         //                "text"        / [ "plain" (RFC-1521), "richtext" (RFC-1341), "enriched", "html", "xvcard", "vcal",
00270         //                                  "rtf", "xml" ],
00271 
00272         UString getContentType()
00273                 {
00274                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeHeader::getContentType()")
00275 
00276                 U_ASSERT(empty() == false)
00277 
00278                 UString content_type = getHeader(*USocket::str_content_type);
00279 
00280                 U_RETURN_STRING(content_type);
00281                 }
00282 
00283         static bool isContentType(const UString& content_type, const char* type, uint32_t len, bool ignore_case = false)
00284                 {
00285                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeHeader::isContentType(%.*S,%.*S,%u,%b)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(content_type), len, type, len, ignore_case)
00286 
00287                 if (content_type.empty() == false)
00288                         {
00289                         bool result = (ignore_case ? strncasecmp(content_type.data(), type, len)
00290                                                                                                 :     strncmp(content_type.data(), type, len)) == 0;
00291 
00292                         U_RETURN(result);
00293                         }
00294 
00295                 U_RETURN(false);
00296                 }
00297 
00298         static bool isType(const UString& content_type, const char* type, uint32_t len)
00299                 {
00300                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeHeader::isType(%.*S,%.*S,%u)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(content_type), len, type, len)
00301 
00302                 if (content_type.empty() == false)
00303                         {
00304                         uint32_t pos = content_type.find('/');
00305 
00306                         if (pos                               != U_NOT_FOUND &&
00307                                  content_type.find(type, pos, len) != U_NOT_FOUND)
00308                                 {
00309                                 U_RETURN(true);
00310                                 }
00311                         }
00312 
00313                 U_RETURN(false);
00314                 }

00321         static bool isMessage(const UString& content_type)
00322                 { return isContentType(content_type, U_CONSTANT_TO_PARAM("message")); }

00325                 { return isContentType(content_type, U_CONSTANT_TO_PARAM("multipart")); }

00328                 { return isContentType(content_type, U_CONSTANT_TO_PARAM("application")); }

00331                 { return isContentType(content_type, U_STRING_TO_PARAM(*str_txt_xml)); }

00334                 { return isContentType(content_type, U_STRING_TO_PARAM(*str_txt_plain)); }

00340         static bool isURLEncoded(const UString& ctype)                  { return isType(ctype, U_CONSTANT_TO_PARAM("urlencoded")); }
00341         static bool isMultipartFormData(const UString& ctype) { return isContentType(ctype, U_CONSTANT_TO_PARAM("multipart/form-data")); }

00345         static UString getBoundary(const UString& content_type)
00346                 {
00347                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeHeader::getBoundary(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(content_type))
00348 
00349                 UString boundary = getValueAttributeFromKeyValue(content_type, *str_boundary, false);
00350 
00351                 U_RETURN_STRING(boundary);
00352                 }
00353 
00354         UString getValueAttributeFromKey(const UString& key, const UString& name)
00355                 {
00356                 U_TRACE(0, "UMimeHeader::getValueAttributeFromKey(%.*S,%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(key), U_STRING_TO_TRACE(name))
00357 
00358                 U_ASSERT(empty() == false)
00359 
00360                 UString value = getHeader(key);
00361 
00362                 if (value.empty() == false) value = getValueAttributeFromKeyValue(value, name, false);
00363 
00364                 U_RETURN_STRING(value);
00365                 }
00366

00368         static UString  getValueAttributeFromKeyValue(const UString& name_attr, UVector<UString>& name_value, bool ignore_case);
00369         static UString  getValueAttributeFromKeyValue(const UString& key_value, const UString& name_attr, bool ignore_case);
